name: FFXI: Vana'diel A tale of three cities
name_original: FFXI: Vana'diel A tale of three cities
description:
This is going  to be my spin on 3 ADD-ONs from Final Fantasy XI.

*A Crystalline Prophecy Missions

*A Moogle Kupo d'Etat Missions

*A Shantotto Ascension Missions

Game features:

Explore parts of Vana 'diel from the three Add-Ons.

Job selection.
